episodes.title: "It's Devastating" - Epstein Survivor on Ghislaine Maxwell's "Special Treatment"
episodes.description:
Have A Seat with Chris Hansen—the all-new platform from America’s most relentless crime fighting journalist.
 
Every Monday, Hansen takes you back inside the stings that shocked the nation on Predators I’ve Caught—with never-before-heard details and new revelations.  Sponsored by Home Title Lock, 24/7 monitoring to detect any tampering with your title or mortgage.  And by TruthFinder.com.  To get the answers you’re looking for and to discover information on potential predators, go to www.TruthFinder.com/predator   Biographies of our predators are found at To Catch A Predator Wiki.
 
Then, pull up a chair on Wednesday for Have A Seat with Chris Hansen, his weekly in-depth interview series where the biggest names in law enforcement, justice, and survival tell their stories.
 
Two shows. One mission. Have A Seat with Chris Hansen. Relentless. Uncompromising. Always watching.
 
Chris Hansen Bio
I have been a reporter and Author for more nearly 40 years. I have tackled some of the toughest topics in some of the most difficult places. From Local News in Detroit Michigan, to Dateline NBC, to Investigation discovery, to Crime Watch Daily I am back on my new show, exclusively on TruBlu Streaming Network called Takedown With Chris Hansen. Check it out at https://www.watchtrublu.com Thank you everyone for your continued support!

episodes.title: Trafficking Is a Global Epidemic: Epstein Survivors’ Warning
episodes.description:
Haley Robson, victim and survivor of Jeffrey Epstein, has a seat with Chris Hansen for an emotional, raw and powerful conversation surrounding her experiences with Epstein and the recent release of the investigation files.  Haley reveals to Chris how she was recruited and groomed by Epstein, how her and the other survivor-victims are uniting, her thoughts on Ghislaine Maxwell and her culpability, and what Epstein took away from her. Robson’s unwavering bravery to expose the truth behind Epstein and his empire shines through in this timely and poignant episode.
